Text: term of service this is legal agreement between the person or organization customer or you agreeing to these term of service term and the applicable contracting entity at http www logmeininc com legal contracting entity logmein u or we by accepting these term signing an order or using the service you represent that you are of legal age and have the authority to bind the customer to the order these term and the applicable service description available at http www logmeininc com legal service description a well a the professional service term and condition available at http www logmeininc com legal professional service term each a applicable collectively the agreement
access and use of the service

1 1 right to use service you agree to use the service in accordance with the use level by which we measure price and offer our service a posted on our website your order or the service description use level you may use our service only a permitted in these term and you consent to our privacy policy at http www logmeininc com legal privacy which is incorporated by reference we grant you limited right to use our service only for business and professional purpose technical support for the service is described in the service description if your affiliate use our service you warrant that you have the authority to bind those affiliate and you will be liable if your affiliate do not comply with the agreement service mean our software a service offering and our audio service including any related hardware which are offered by logmein audio llc grasshopper group llc or jive communication inc or their subsidiary our telecommunication provider responsible for the rate and term relating to the respective audio service the service description are incorporated into these term you understand that your personal data may be processed in connection with your use of our service software and website which are provided via equipment and resource located in the united state and other location throughout the world

1 2 limitation on use by using our service you agree on behalf of yourself your user and your attendee not to modify prepare derivative work of or reverse engineer our service ii knowingly or negligently use our service in way that abuse or disrupts our network user account or the service iii transmit through the service any harassing indecent obscene fraudulent or unlawful material iv market or resell the service to any third party use the service in violation of applicable law or regulation vi use the service to send unauthorized advertising or spam vii harvest collect or gather user data without their consent or viii transmit through the service any material that may infringe the intellectual property privacy or other right of third party

1 3 change to service we reserve the right to enhance upgrade improve or modify feature of our service a we deem appropriate and in our discretion we will not materially reduce the core functionality a set forth in the service description or discontinue any service unless we provide you with prior written notice we may offer additional functionality to our standard service or premium feature improvement for an additional cost

1 4 proprietary right and logmein mark you acknowledge that we or our licensors retain all proprietary right title and interest in the service our name logo or other mark together the logmein mark and any related intellectual property right including without limitation all modification enhancement derivative work and upgrade thereto you agree that you will not use or register any trademark service mark business name domain name or social medium account name or handle which incorporates in whole or in part the logmein mark or is similar to any of these you agree to comply with our branding guideline available at http www logmeininc com legal trademark which are incorporated into this agreement by reference
order fee and payment

2 1 order you may order service using our then current ordering process order all order are effective on the earlier of the date you submit your order or ii the date on the signature block of the order effective date acceptance of your order may be subject to our verification and credit approval process each order shall be treated a separate and independent order purchase order is required for non credit card transaction over 25 000 usd or equivalent unless customer doe not require purchase order a part of it purchasing process

2 1 1 covid 19 emergency kit service any subscription to service labeled a covid 19 emergency kit are for use across your organization during the contract term listed in the order for such subscription and will automatically terminate thereafter or if you have active subscription for the service being purchased on the earlier of the contract term set forth in the order or the expiration of your underlying paid subscription term if you have active subscription for the service being purchased the covid 19 emergency kit subscription are subject to your existing contract with logmein and do not change the term of any previously purchased service you may choose to purchase any of the covid 19 emergency kit subscription under separate order but you are under no obligation to do so

2 2 fee and payment you agree to pay all applicable undisputed fee for the service on the term set forth on the invoice except a set forth in section 3 3 below or in the service description any and all payment you make to u for access to the service are final and non refundable you are responsible for all fee and charge imposed by your voice and data transmission provider related to your access and use of the service you are responsible for providing accurate and current billing contact and payment information to u or any reseller you agree that we may take step to verify whether your payment method is valid charge your payment card or bill you for all amount due for your use of the service and automatically update your payment card information using software designed to do so in the event your payment card on file is no longer valid you agree that your credit card information and related personal data may be provided to third party for payment processing and fraud prevention purpose we may suspend or terminate your service if at any time we determine that your payment information is inaccurate or not current and you are responsible for fee and overdraft charge that we may incur when we charge your card for payment we will not agree to submit invoice via any customer procure to pay online portal or electronic data interchange edi portal we reserve the right to update the price for service at any time after your initial term and price change will be effective a of your next billing cycle we will notify you of any price change by publishing on our website emailing quoting or invoicing you

2 3 sale promotional offer coupon and pricing sale promotion and other special discounted pricing offer are temporary and upon the renewal of your subscription any such discounted pricing offer may expire we reserve the right to discontinue or modify any coupon credit sale and special promotional offer in our sole discretion

2 4 dispute delinquent account you must notify u of any fee dispute within 15 day of the invoice date and once resolved you agree to pay those fee within 15 day we may on notice to you suspend or terminate your service if you do not pay undisputed fee and you agree to reimburse u for all reasonable cost and expense incurred in collecting delinquent amount

2 5 tax and withholding you are responsible for all applicable sale service value added good and service withholding tariff universal service fund usf fee or any other similar fee a may be applicable in the location in which the service are being provided if applicable to the audio service only and similar tax or fee collectively tax and fee imposed by any government entity or collecting agency based on the service except those tax and fee based on our net income or tax and fee for which you have provided an exemption certificate additionally if you do not satisfy your tax and fee obligation you agree that you will be required to reimburse u for any tax and fee paid on your behalf and we may take step to collect tax and fee we have paid on your behalf in all case you will pay the amount due under this agreement to u in full without any right of set off or deduction
term and termination

3 1 term the initial term commitment for your purchase of service will be a specified on an order initial term and begin on the effective date after the initial term the service will unless otherwise specified in the service description for particular service automatically renew for additional 12 month period renewal term unless either party provides notice of non renewal at least 30 day before the current term expires you may provide notice of non renewal for each service you do not wish to renew at http support logmeininc com contactus we may agree to align the invoicing under multiple order but this will not reduce the term of any order terminating specific service doe not affect the term of any other service still in effect if we permit you to reinstate service at any time after termination you agree that you will be bound by the then current term and the renewal date that wa in effect a of the effective termination date

3 2 termination for cause either party may terminate the agreement if the other party breach it material obligation and fails to cure within 30 day of receipt of written notice or ii if the other party becomes insolvent or bankrupt liquidated or is dissolved or cease substantially all of it business and we may suspend access or terminate immediately if you breach section 1 2 4 or 5

3 3 effect of termination if the agreement or any service are terminated your account may be converted to free or basic version of the service if available at our discretion otherwise you will immediately discontinue all use of the terminated service except that upon request we will provide you with limited access to the service for period not to exceed 30 day solely to enable you to retrieve your content from the service we have no obligation to maintain your content after that period neither party will be liable for any damage resulting from termination of the agreement and termination will not affect any claim arising prior to the effective termination date if we discontinue service or materially reduce the core functionality in accordance with section 1 3 above the related order will be terminated and we will provide you with pro rata refund of any prepaid unused fee you agree to pay for any use of the service past the date of expiration or termination which have not been converted to free version of the service

3 4 survival the provision of section 2 order fee and payment 3 3 effect of termination 4 your content and account 7 indemnification 8 limitation on liability 9 6 no class action 9 11 notice and 9 14 contracting party choice of law and location for resolving dispute survive any termination of the agreement
your content and account

4 1 your content you retain all right to your content defined below and we do not own or license your content we may use modify reproduce and distribute your content in order to provide and operate the service you warrant that you have the right to upload or otherwise share content with u and ii your uploading or processing of your content in the context of our service doe not infringe on any right of any third party each party agrees to apply reasonable technical organizational and administrative security measure to keep content protected in accordance with industry standard we will not view access or process any of your content except a authorized or instructed by you or your user in this agreement or in any other agreement between the party or a required to comply with our policy applicable law or governmental request you agree to comply with all legal duty applicable to you a data controller by virtue of the submission of your content within the service if your content including any personal data a defined under applicable law which includes but is not limited to the general data protection regulation eu 2016 679 or gdpr and data protection law of the european union european economic area switzerland collectively the eea and the united kingdom and is processed by u a data processor acting on your behalf in your capacity a data controller we will use and process your content in order to provide the service and fulfill our obligation under the agreement and in accordance with your instruction a represented in this agreement notwithstanding anything to the contrary this section 4 1 express the entirety of our obligation with respect to your content content mean any file document recording chat log transcript and similar data that we maintain on your or your user behalf a well a any other information you or your user may upload to your service account in connection with the service

4 2 your account you are solely responsible for all use of the service by you and your user ii maintaining lawful basis for the collection use processing and transfer of content and iii providing notice or obtaining consent a legally required in connection with the service we do not send email asking for your usernames or password and to keep your account secure you should keep all usernames and password confidential we are not liable for any loss that you may incur if third party us your password or account we may suspend the service or terminate the agreement if you your user or attendee are using the service in manner that is likely to cause harm to u you agree to notify u immediately and terminate any unauthorized access to the service or other security breach

compliance with law in connection with the performance access and use of the service under the agreement each party agrees to comply with all applicable law rule and regulation including but not limited to export privacy and data protection law and regulation each party represents that it is not named on any s government denied party list further customer shall not permit it user to access or use any service or content in u embargoed country or in violation of any s export law or regulation if necessary and in accordance with applicable law we will cooperate with local state federal and international government authority with respect to the service notwithstanding any other provision in these term we may immediately terminate the agreement for noncompliance with applicable law

warranty we warrant that the service will conform to the service description under normal use we do not represent or warrant that the use of our service will be timely uninterrupted or error free or operate in combination with any specific hardware software system or data ii our service will meet your requirement or iii all error or defect will be corrected use of the service is at your sole risk our entire liability and your exclusive remedy under this warranty will be at our sole option and subject to applicable law to provide conforming service or to terminate the non conforming service or the applicable order and provide pro rated refund of any prepaid fee from the date you notify u of the non conformance through the end of the remaining term to the extent permitted by applicable law we disclaim all other warranty and condition whether express implied statutory or otherwise including any express or implied warranty of merchantability satisfactory quality title fitness for particular purpose and non infringement some jurisdiction do not allow the exclusion of certain warranty and condition therefore some of the above exclusion may not apply to customer located in those jurisdiction

indemnification you will indemnify and defend u against any third party claim resulting from breach of section 1 2 or 4 or alleging that any of your content infringes upon any patent or copyright or violates trade secret of any party and you agree to pay reasonable attorney fee court cost damage finally awarded or reasonable settlement cost with respect to any such claim we will promptly notify you of any claim and cooperate with you in defending the claim you will reimburse u for reasonable expense incurred in providing any cooperation or assistance you will have full control and authority over the defense and settlement of any claim except that any settlement requiring u to admit liability requires prior written consent not to be unreasonably withheld or delayed and ii we may join in the defense with our own counsel at our own expense
limitation on liability

8 1 limitation on indirect liability neither party will be liable to the other party or to any other person for any indirect special consequential or incidental loss exemplary or other such damage including without limitation damage arising out of or relating to loss of data ii loss of income iii loss of opportunity iv lost profit or cost of recovery however caused and based on any theory of liability including but not limited to breach of contract tort including negligence or violation of statute whether or not such party ha been advised of the possibility of such damage some jurisdiction do not allow limitation or exclusion of liability for incidental or consequential damage so some of the above limitation may not apply

8 2 limitation on amount of liability except for your breach of section 1 2 or 4 and your indemnification obligation and to the extent permitted by applicable law the total cumulative liability of either party and their respective licensors and supplier arising out of this agreement is limited to the sum of the amount paid for the applicable service during the 12 month immediately preceding the incident giving rise to the liability the foregoing doe not limit your obligation to pay any undisputed fee and other amount due under any order
additional term

9 1 supplemental data processing addendum if you are located in or are subject to the applicable law of the eea and or the united kingdom including the gdpr you may complete logmein data processing addendum dpa online at http www logmeininc com trust dpa additional information about logmein privacy security and sub processor disclosure can be found at http www logmeininc com trust

9 2 free service and trial your right to access and use any free service is not guaranteed for any period of time and we reserve the right in our sole discretion to limit or terminate your use of any free version of any service by any individual or entity if you are using the service on trial or promotional basis trial period your trial period and access to the service will terminate at the end of the trial period stated in your order or ii if no date is specified 30 day after your initial access to the service iii or upon your conversion to subscription during the trial period to the extent permitted by law we provide the service a is and without warranty or indemnity and all other term otherwise apply we may modify or discontinue any trial or promotion at any time without notice

9 3 third party feature service may provide the capability for you to link to or integrate with third party site or application third party service we are not responsible for and do not endorse third party service you have sole discretion whether to purchase or connect to any third party service and your use is governed solely by the term for those third party service

9 4 beta service we may offer you access to beta service that are being provided prior to general release but we do not make any guarantee that these service will be made generally available beta service you understand and agree that the beta service may contain bug error and other defect and use of the beta service is at your sole risk you acknowledge that your use of beta service is on voluntary and optional basis and we have no obligation to provide technical support and may discontinue provision of beta service at any time in our sole discretion and without prior notice to you these beta service are offered a is and to the extent permitted by applicable law we disclaim any liability warranty indemnity and condition whether express implied statutory or otherwise if you are using beta service you agree to receive related correspondence and update from u and acknowledge that opting out may result in cancellation of your access to the beta service if you provide feedback feedback about the beta service you agree that we own any feedback that you share with u for the beta service only these term supersede any conflicting term and condition in the agreement but only to the extent necessary to resolve conflict
9 5 copyright if you believe that our service have been used in way that constitutes copyright infringement you should follow the process outlined here http www logmeininc com legal dmca

9 6 no class action you may only resolve dispute with u on an individual basis and you agree not to bring or participate in any class consolidated or representative action against u or any of our employee or affiliate

9 7 security emergency if we reasonably determine that the security of our service or infrastructure may be compromised due to hacking attempt denial of service attack or other malicious activity we may temporarily suspend the service and we will take action to promptly resolve any security issue we will notify you of any suspension or other action taken for security reason

9 8 high risk use you understand that the service are not designed or intended for use during high risk activity which include but are not limited to use in hazardous environment requiring fail safe control weapon system aircraft navigation control or communication system and or life support system

9 9 recording certain service provide functionality that allows you to record audio and data shared during session you are solely responsible for complying with all applicable law in the relevant jurisdiction while using recording functionality we disclaim all liability for your recording of audio or shared data and you agree to hold u harmless from damage or liability related to the recording of any audio or data

9 10 assignment neither party may assign it right or delegate it duty under the agreement either in whole or in part without the other party prior written consent which shall not be unreasonably withheld except that either party may assign the agreement to an affiliated entity or a part of corporate reorganization consolidation merger acquisition or sale of all or substantially all of it business or asset to which this agreement relates any attempted assignment without consent will be void the agreement will bind and inure to the benefit of each party successor or assigns

9 11 notice notice must be sent by personal delivery overnight courier or registered or certified mail we may also provide notice to the email last designated on your account electronically via posting on our website in product notice or our self service portal or administrative center unless specified elsewhere in this agreement notice should be sent to u at the address for your applicable contracting entity with copy to our legal department 320 summer street boston massachusetts 02210 usa and we will send notice to the address last designated on your account notice is given upon personal delivery for overnight courier on the second business day after notice is sent for registered or certified mail on the fifth business day after notice is sent for email when the email is sent or if posted electronically upon posting

9 12 regional term if you are located in region outside the united state and are purchasing the jive and or gotoconnect service additional term specific to your region a set forth in our regional supplement at http www logmeininc com legal regional supplement shall apply to your use of the service and shall be considered part of these term

9 13 entire agreement order of precedence the agreement including any applicable dpa set forth the entire agreement between u relating to the service and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous oral and written agreement except a otherwise permitted if there is conflict between an executed order these term the dpa if applicable and the service description the conflict will be resolved in that order but only for the specific service described in the applicable order nothing contained in any document submitted by you will add to or otherwise modify the agreement we may update the term from time to time which will be identified by the last updated date and may be reviewed at http www logmeininc com legal term and condition your continued access to and use of the service constitutes your acceptance of the then current term

9 14 general term if any term of this agreement is not enforceable this will not affect any other term both party are independent contractor and nothing in this agreement creates partnership agency fiduciary or employment relationship between the party no person or entity not party to the agreement will be third party beneficiary our authorized distributor do not have the right to modify the agreement or to make commitment binding on u failure to enforce any right under the agreement will not waive that right unless otherwise specified remedy are cumulative the agreement may be agreed to online or executed by electronic signature and in one or more counterpart no party will be responsible for any delay or failure to perform under the agreement due to force majeure event g natural disaster terrorist activity activity of third party service provider labor dispute and act of government and act beyond party reasonable control but only for so long a those condition persist

9 15 contracting party choice of law and location for resolving dispute the logmein contracting entity contact information and governing law for your use of the service will depend on where you are and the specific service you have ordered a set forth here http www logmeininc com legal contracting entity last updated march 2020 2020 v1
